Project Summary

Project Information

FieldValue
NameRegular Expression Builder for Java
DescriptionThe purpose of reb4j is to provide a pure Java wrapper around the regular expression syntax provided by the JRE's java.util.regex.Pattern class in order to facilitate programmatic construction of regular expressions while taking advantage of compile-time syntax checking.
Homepagehttp://reggert.github.com/reb4j

Project Organization

NameRichard W. Eggert II
URLhttps://github.com/reggert
